description: After working in top-level restaurants both in Italy and abroad, the young chef at this restaurant in the Borgobrufa hotel offers a host of interesting dishes featuring excellent Umbrian ingredients, often sourced from local growers and farmers. Meat dishes dominate the menu, alongside a good selection of vegetables.
